Neidi

Korean: 네이디

Country:

South Korea

Birthday:
Nov 4, 1995
Age:
29 years old

Introduction


Neidi (네이디) is a South Korean singer-songwriter and composer under 1028 Corporation. She made her solo debut on June 3, 2017 with the digital single under the name Hiyeon (하이연).
